blogPost.excerpt: Earn more revenue from your app or site without showing ads (OR) placing more ads AudiencePlay converts every user footprint into audiences and shares it with brands to unlock an alternative revenue stream Secure + ISO27001 Certified + Privacy Complaint
blogPost.body: Earn more revenue from your app or site without showing ads (OR) placing more ads AudiencePlay converts every user footprint into audiences and shares it with brands to unlock an alternative revenue stream Secure + ISO27001 Certified + Privacy Complaint
blogPost.title: AudiencePlay - Free monetization platform for websites and apps
blogPost.author: Raghu KLN

localize.description: 从您的应用程序或网站赚取更多的收入，而不显示广告（或）放置更多的广告AudiencePlay将每一个用户足迹转化为受众，并将其与品牌共享，以解锁另一种收入来源安全+ISO27001认证+隐私投诉。
localize.tagline: 网站和应用的免费货币化平台

localize.description: 從您的應用程序或網站賺取更多的收入，而不顯示廣告（或）放置更多的廣告AudiencePlay將每一個用戶足跡轉化爲受衆，並將其與品牌共享，以解鎖另一種收入來源安全+ISO27001認證+隱私投訴。
localize.tagline: 網站和應用的免費貨幣化平臺

previous.excerpt: Dreambook is simply a database specially created for your dreams. Without thinking of limitation, save your dreams, analyze them. After you start using Dreambook, with the upcoming features and updates you will have more than you expect from your dreams.
previous.title: Dreambook - Dream journal, interpreter and tracker

localize.description: 梦境簿只是一个专门为您的梦境建立的数据库。不考虑任何限制，保存你的梦境，分析它们。当您开始使用Dreambook后，随着即将到来的功能和更新，您将从您的梦想中获得更多的东西。
localize.tagline: 梦境日记、解释者和追踪者

localize.description: 夢境簿只是一個專門爲您的夢境建立的數據庫。不考慮任何限制，保存你的夢境，分析它們。當您開始使用Dreambook後，隨着即將到來的功能和更新，您將從您的夢想中獲得更多的東西。
localize.tagline: 夢境日記、解釋者和追蹤者

next.excerpt: Trainn helps SaaS companies accelerate product adoption with product walkthrough videos and training academies for users. With better product education leads to better onboarding and decreases time to value of your product leading to higher retention.
next.title: Trainn - A new way to create professional product walkthrough videos.

localize.description: Trainn帮助SaaS公司通过产品演练视频和用户培训学院来加速产品的应用。通过更好的产品教育，使用户更好地入职，减少产品价值的时间，从而提高用户的留存率。
localize.tagline: 一种全新的方式来制作专业的产品演练视频。

localize.description: Trainn幫助SaaS公司通過產品演練視頻和用戶培訓學院來加速產品的應用。通過更好的產品教育，使用戶更好地入職，減少產品價值的時間，從而提高用戶的留存率。
localize.tagline: 一種全新的方式來製作專業的產品演練視頻。
